casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Amia Smith ERVIN 331P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2017 Mary McCullers Reece, Attorney at Law, Smithfield, for Ervin, Amia Smith. Narcisa Woods, Attorney at Law, Narcisa Woods, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for State of North Carolina, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of October 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of October 2017."
